news.title: An AI-generated band got 1m plays on Spotify. Now music insiders say listeners should be warned
news.summary: The Velvet Sundown released two albums before admitting their music, images and backstory were created by AI. They went viral, amassing more than 1m streams on Spotify in a matter of weeks. The episode has triggered a debate about authenticity, with music industry insiders saying streaming sites should be legally obliged to tag music.

news.title: Scientists reportedly hiding AI text prompts in academic papers to receive positive peer reviews
news.summary: Research papers found carrying hidden white text giving instructions not to highlight negatives as concern grows over use of large language models for peer review. Nikkei reported on 1 July it had reviewed research papers from 14 academic institutions in eight countries.

news.title: ‘The way a child plays is the way they live’: how therapists are using video games to help vulnerable children
news.summary: Oleksii Sukhorukov's son was 12 when the Russian invasion of Ukraine began. His boy had one outlet: Minecraft. Whatever was happening outside, he’d boot up Mojang’s block-building video game and escape.
